head.title: Equity Offerings Planned During the Week

hedline.hl1: Equity Offerings Planned During the Week

block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
ASAT Holdings Ltd., Hong Kong, an initial public offering of 20 million American depository receipts, each representing five common shares. Chase H& Q.
ASE Test Ltd., Taiwan, eight million shares. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter and Goldman, Sachs.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
ASAT Holdings Ltd., Hong Kong, an initial public offering of 20 million American depository receipts, each representing five common shares. Chase H& Q.
ASE Test Ltd., Taiwan, eight million shares. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter and Goldman, Sachs.
Axcelis Technologies, Beverly, Mass., an initial public offering of 15.5 million shares. Goldman, Sachs.
Divine InterVentures, Lisle, Ill., an initial public offering of 14.3 million class A shares. Robertson Stephens.
Entegris Inc., Chaska, Minn., an initial public offering of 13 million shares. Merrill Lynch.
I-many Inc., Portland, Me., an initial public offering of 7.5 million shares. Robertson Stephens.
Impco Technologies, Cerritos, Calif., 2.5 million shares. Robertson Stephens.
Infinite Technology Group, Mineola, N.Y., an initial public offering of two million shares. Auerbach Pollak.
Network Engines, Randolph, Mass., an initial public offering of 5.5 million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
OmniVision Technologies, Sunnyvale, Calif., an initial public offering of five million shares. Robertson Stephens.
Pain Therapeutics, San Francisco, an initial public offering of five million shares. Thomas Weisel & Partners.
Sohu.com, Beijing, an initial public offering of 4.6 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston.
Sunrise Telecom, San Jose, Calif., an initial public offering of four million shares. Chase H& Q.
Triton Network Systems, Orlando, Fla., an initial
public offering of 5.5 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston.
Turkcell IIetisim Hizmetleri, Istanbul, an initial public offering of 96 million American depository receipts, each representing 250 shares. Goldman, Sachs.
Virata Corp., Santa Clara, Calif., four million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston.
(Source: MCM EquityWatch)
